blogs.title: Everything you need to know about Abiya
blogs.body: Abiya is a bitch. If you are in search of your true Love and you come across Abiya, turn right back away because she will ruin your life.
blogs.author: Azain

blogs.title: Everything you need to know about Maryam
blogs.body:
Maryam is a decent girl.
IF you are in search of your true and you come across Maryam, stick to her because she has the potential to be your special person. I am aslo simping for her right now, so it will be a competition between you and me regarding who gets to be with her forever.
blogs.author: Usama

blogs.title: Everything you need to know about Fariya
blogs.body:
Fariya is a Pakistani girl who lives in Nederland.
I am currently her friend and striving for more and by more, I mean to convince her to call me there in Nederland so that I can finally move out of Pakistan.
If you come across Fariya kindly move away because she can only be mine.
blogs.author: Huzaifa
